entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Adding Json aot/trimmer-safe overloads to [Typed]Results #46252
    8.0-preview2
  • Kestrel process creating multiple threads. #46247
  • Can't modify OutputCacheContext.Tags from IOutputCachePolicy.ServeResponseAsync #46243
  • Option to disable updating `appsettings.Development.json` when creating a user JWT #46239
    8.0-preview2
  • Posibility to Customize Model Binding errors Key #46238
  • Blazor - EditorRequired attribute cannot be applied for two-way data binding parameters #46234
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Setting `DefaultScheme` in authentication configuration is not working #46232
  • Disable named pipes transport on non-Windows platforms #46231
  • [AOT] Add safe route value overloads to `Results` and `TypeResults` #46229
    8.0-preview2

Closed

  • Links in yml file to https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/vsts/pipelines/yaml-schema lead to a 404 error #46205
  • [Blazor WebAssembly Project Template] Change web app manifest extension to “webmanifest” #43755
    .NET 8 Planning
  • AmazonDynamoDBClient fails in Blazor Webassembly #46204
  • Add `Map` implementation with overload for `InferMetadata` and `CreateRequestDelegate` #46163
    8.0-preview1
  • Blazor Custom elements in .net 7 with Blazor Server and Angular (copy of 46091) #46235
  • Blazor - correct approach for two-way data binding is not correct according to Visual Studio #46237
  • Received unexpected acknowledgement for render batch #46242
  • Validate the changes: SPA Proxy enhancements #45320
    8.0-preview1
  • Allow user-jwts to use a custom scheme name #46233
  • [API] RequestDelegateFactory.Create RequestDelegate overload #46024
    8.0-preview2
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #45944
  • Change docs.microsoft.com links to learn.microsoft.com #44175
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Fix Settings_MaxHeaderListSize_Server #46251
    area-runtime, tell-mode, 7.0.4
  • Improve IIS error when wrong application path #46249
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • Convert UTF16 to UTF 8 #46245
    area-mvc
  • UseBlazorFrameworkFiles: add webcil mime type mapping #46244
    area-blazor
  • [Named Pipe] Check for pipe broken on WaitConnectionAsync #46230
    area-runtime

Merged

  • [Blazor WebAssembly] Change web app manifest extension to “webmanifest” #43756
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Update CredScanSuppression after Kestrel move #46250
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `af74f44` to `83c2bdc` #46122
    area-infrastructure, feature-spa, area-blazor, 8.0-preview1
  • Changed docs.microsoft.com links to learn.microsoft.com Issue: #44175 #46206
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • [SignalR] [Java] Log 'WebSocket stopped' once #43532
    area-signalr, signalr-client-java, 8.0-preview1
  • Update SDK #46224
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Prevent merging PRs which have CI checks run a week+ ago #46177
    area-infrastructure
  • [AOT] Enable analysis and annotate Http.Results #46082
    area-web-frameworks
  • Improve Win bundle installers' UI #45935
    area-infrastructure, feature-installers
  • [release/7.0] Add support for JSON output to more `user-jwts` commands #45431
    area-commandlinetools, area-web-frameworks
  • Fix DictionaryModelBinder null reference issue #45515
    area-web-frameworks
  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Consistently return StringValues.Empty instead of default for missing headers #46226
    area-runtime
  • Adding STJ Polymorphism to Result Types #46008
    area-web-frameworks
  • Evaluate BoundProperties when inferring BindindSource #46228
  • Remove JsonSerializerOptions copy in ProblemDetailsJsonOptionsSetup #46225
    area-runtime
  • [Named pipes] Disconnect + delayed client read test cases #46166
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Exclude regex and alpha constraints when SlimBuilder is used. #46227
    area-runtime
